doc.title: Benim de kalbim var
doc.plot: Selma works as a maid at Nurettin Bey's house. As the family goes on vacation to Europe, Selma plays the role of the landlady and hires a driver, Murat. Selma meets Kenan who is after her fortune. As Murat tells her about Kenan's real intentions, she doesn't believe him. Kenan wants to steal the jewelery in the house, but Murat catches him red-handed. Murat and Selma fall in love, yet as Nurettin Bey is about to come back Selma fires him telling that that he is penniless. In fact, Murat comes from a rich family. Murat wants to marry Selma but she is ashamed of her lie. However, true love gets the two together in the end.
